content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UK Culture Club \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the UK our Culture Club takes the lead on organizing events to keep our employees connected, through things like annual social events, Friday Beers, Spanish classes and more. You can keep up to date with what’s going on by adding the Shared EPAM HR Culture Club UK calendar to your Outlook. We’re always open to ideas for what we could do next, so please don’t hesitate to share these with the Culture Club. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
